casebody.data:
STROUSE
v.
WEBCOR CONSTRUCTION (ACCO ENGINEERED SYSTEMS) S256136 Supreme Court of California. JULY 10, 2019 Votes: Cantil-Sakauye, C.J., Chin, Corrigan, Liu, Cuéllar and Groban, JJ.

The petition for review is granted. Further action in this matter is deferred pending consideration and disposition of related issues in Sandoval v. Qualcomm, Inc., S252796 and Gonzalez v. Mathis, S247677 (see Cal. Rules of Court, rule 8.512(d)(2) ), or pending further order of the court. Submission of additional briefing, pursuant to California Rules of Court, rule 8.520, is deferred pending further order of the *281court. Kruger, J., was absent and did not participate.
